pages.text: $(o)"The Witch was born out of distortion, and beneath the Moon, the Witch whispers her secrets to the skin of the world, and each time a secret is repeated, the skin chills, though it be for only a fraction of a moment."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with $(item)an Enchanted Book$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Magan$() aspect. It can also work as a boost for enchanting tables, and will greatly increase Magan regen, and will decrease Magan stunting times.
